Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Reporting Firewalls By Event Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewalls by the number of events sent

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_31
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Config Changes Detected From Log
Report.Description: This report provides details about router config changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall Run vs Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a firewall's running and startup config

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_DELTA_CONFIG" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router/Switch Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected startup or running config changes - the changes are detected by logging into the device and hence is accurate.

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ("PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_RUN_CONFIG","PH_DEV_MON_CHANGE_STARTUP_CONFIG") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about firewall admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Router Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about router admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_ConfigChange,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Firewall NAT Translations
Report.Description: This report captures the NAT translations over a time window

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewalls and Outbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted outbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_20
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewalls and Inbound Permitted Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks firewalls and permitted inbound services by first the total number of connections and then by bytes for that service

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_21
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr NOT IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewalls and Permitted High Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks the high port services permitted by firewalls - these services may pose security risk

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewalls and Permitted Uncommon Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - common services include DNS, SMTP, Web

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort NOT IN (25,53,80,443,123)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewalls and Permitted Vulnerable Low Port Services By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Tracks uncommon services permitted by firewalls - vulnerable services include Microsoft services such as MS-RPC (135), NETBIOS-SSN (139), MICROSOFT-DS (445), MS-SQL (1433,1434), FTP (23), TELNET (21)

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND destIpPort IN (135,139,445,1433,1434,23,21) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Top Firewall Originated Or Destined Permitted Connections By Count
Report.Description: Ranks the firewall originated or destined connections - these connections would be typically be for administrative and monitoring purposes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND (srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) OR destIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top Reporting Security Management Servers

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_6
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 1.x: Virus found but not remediated by Host Antivirus
Report.Description: Captures events that indicate the viruses that Host Antivirus found but failed to remedy

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Worm_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Spyware found but not remediated by Host Antivirus

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Spyware_Remedy_Failed) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top hosts with Malware found by Host Antivirus

SubPattern.name: Filter_AV_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top IPs with Malware Found By IPS and Firewalls
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by IPS

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Top IPs with Malware Found By Antivirus and Security Gateways
Report.Description: Tracks IP addresses with Malware as found by Host Anti-virus and Security Gateways

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Malware) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 5.x: Non-compliant Hosts and Security Software License Expirations
Report.Description: Tracks non-compliant hosts and license expiry events from Security Management Gateways and Firewalls. Non-compliant hosts may not have proper security software running and therefore may pose a security threat. License expiration of security software may expose exploitable security vulnerabilities.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Vuln_12
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_LicenseExpired,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NoncompliantHost) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_NETWORK_IPS,Group@PH_SYS_APP_SEC_MGMT,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL,Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_SEC_GW) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x,10.x: Detailed Successful Login At PCI Device
Report.Description: Captures detailed successful logins at any device or application including servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonSuccess, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Windows Server Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report captures account lockouts on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Windows Domain Account Lockouts
Report.Description: This report details windows domain account lockouts

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Windows Server Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on windows servers. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_43
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Domain Account Lock/Unlock history
Report.Description: Captures account lockouts and unlocks on domain accounts. Account lockouts happen on repeated login failures and may be suspicious if they are repeated or happen at odd hours of operation.

SubPattern.name: Filter_DC_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_APP_DOMAIN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountLocked,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainAccountUnlocked) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_42
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PasswordChange) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows User Accounts Created
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts added on a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_26
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType = "Win-Security-624" AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows User Accounts Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures user accounts removed from a server

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_27
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI) AND eventType = "Win-Security-630"

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows User Accounts Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local user account modifications.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_28
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-625", "Win-Security-626","Win-Security-642", "Win-Security-627", "Win-Security-628", "Win-Security-629","Win-Security-636","Win-Security-650","Win-Security-637","Win-Security-651","Win-Security-632","Win-Security-633","Win-Security-655","Win-Security-656","Win-Security-660","Win-Security-661","Win-Security-665","Win-Security-666") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Added To Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_32
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-636", "Win-Security-650") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Added To Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users added to global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_33
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-632", "Win-Security-655","Win-Security-660", "Win-Security-665")

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Deleted From Local Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users deleted from local groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_34
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-637", "Win-Security-651") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Users Deleted From Global Groups
Report.Description: This report captures users deleted from global or univeral groups.

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_35
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-633", "Win-Security-656","Win-Security-661", "Win-Security-666") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures local group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_36
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-638", "Win-Security-652") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures local group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_37
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-639", "Win-Security-649") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Local Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures local group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_41
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-635", "Win-Security-648") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Global Windows Groups Created
Report.Description: This report captures global group creations

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_38
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-631", "Win-Security-653","Win-Security-658", "Win-Security-663") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Global Windows Groups Deleted
Report.Description: This report captures global group deletions

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_39
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-634", "Win-Security-657","Win-Security-662", "Win-Security-667") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 8.x: Global Windows Groups Modified
Report.Description: This report captures global group modifications

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_40
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ("Win-Security-641", "Win-Security-654","Win-Security-659", "Win-Security-664") AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Detailed Failed Login At PCI System
Report.Description: Captures detailed failed logins at any device or application - servers, network devices, domain controllers, VPN gateways, WLAN controllers and applications

SubPattern.name: Filter_Auth_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_DomainLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_VPNLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_WirelessLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Privileged Windows Server Logon Attempts using the Administrator Account
Report.Description: This report details prvileged logon attempts to a windows server using the Administrator account

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_29
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND user = "Administrator" AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Remote Desktop Connections to Windows Servers
Report.Description: This report details successful and failed remote desktop connections

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_30
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND winLogonType = 10 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Unix Server Privileged Logon
Report.Description: This report details UNIX server privileged logon (su) details with all parsed parameters and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_10
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Unix Server Privileged Command Execution
Report.Description: This report details privilege command execuations (sudo) at a Unix server

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_9
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND (eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecSuccess) OR eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostPrivExecFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_24
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed Router Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all successful VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_13
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogoff) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed VPN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Provides event details for all failed VPN admin logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_VPNGW_14
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_VPN_GATEWAY) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Successful WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks successful admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Failed WLAN Admin Logon
Report.Description: Tracks failed admin logons to the WLAN Controller

SubPattern.name: Filter_WLAN_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WLAN_CONTROLLER) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Network Device Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks network device down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI))

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI))

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppShutdown) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Network Device Link Module Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks network device miscellaneous module (e.g. fan, power etc.) down/up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_OtherModuleDown) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)

Report.Name: PCI 10.x: Network Device Errors
Report.Description: Tracks errors reported by network device

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_Error) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_Network) AND reptDevIpAddr IN (BizService@PH_SYS_BizSrvc_PCI)
